java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, CacheObserver, UpdateInvokerObserver, SettingsObserver
public class DataFileSettingsWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements UpdateInvokerObserver, SettingsObserver, CacheObserver
